sentences:
Sentence 0:
When cells were allowed to become inactive by suspending them in the dark in Mg2+-free buffer, full activity could be restored with a few minutes by adding 20 mM Mg2+ and illuminating the cells.
sentence_raw: When cells were allowed to become inactive by suspending them in the dark in Mg2+-free buffer, full activity could be restored with a few minutes by adding 20 mM Mg2+ and illuminating the cells.
